comments.body:
> Can these be corrected to refer to Kubernetes specifically?

@swinslow to double check, did you mean changing the literal `PACKAGE` to literal `Kubernetes` or something else?
Hi @nikhita, yes, that's correct. Changing to `Kubernetes` is good here to avoid the ambiguity of `PACKAGE`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1,5 @@# German translation.
# Copyright (C) 2017

comments.body: Sometimes the object names are quoted, sometimes they are not.

Yes, but it's the same in the english template. I tried to stay with the original instead of being consistent. It's handled the same way in the other translations.
This is also the case for ReplicationController vs Replication-Controller vs Replication Controller etc.

If a consistent translation is preferred I can also quote the object names.
